nodes.documentation:
@title PausableProxy
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: PausableProxy

nodes.documentation: @dev The ClaimableProxy constructor validates PENDING_OWNER_SLOT constant.
@dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @return True when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: _getPaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the paused state.
@param _paused New paused state.
nodes.name: _setPaused
